entry.source: {F812}Ambitious Hunter\0{F87A,67}{F813,1,403002}Hey, have you heard the rumors about{F801}Ikebukuro? They say that it's free{F801}from the Ashura-kai's control.{F801}{F802}All the Hunters who dislike the{F801}Ashura-kai are heading there.{F801}{F802}I haven't heard from anyone who went{F801}there, though. It must be so nice{F801}that they don't want to come back...{F801}{F802}I really wish I knew what Ikebukuro{F801}is like.{F801}

They say that it's free{F801}from the Ashura-kai's control.{F801}{F802}All the Hunters who dislike the{F801}Ashura-kai are heading there.{F801}{F802}I haven't heard from anyone who went{F801}there, though. It must be so nice{F801}that they don't want to come back...{F801}{F802}I really wish I knew what Ikebukuro{F801}is like.{F801}{F802}I heard it used to be a big place for{F801}entertainment. Just thinking about a{F801}place like that fires me up.{F801}

It must be so nice{F801}that they don't want to come back...{F801}{F802}I really wish I knew what Ikebukuro{F801}is like.{F801}{F802}I heard it used to be a big place for{F801}entertainment. Just thinking about a{F801}place like that fires me up.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Ambitious Hunter\0{F87A,67}I really want to go!{F801}{F802}I might even risk getting eaten by{F801}demons, just for the chance to go{F801}there...{F801}{F802}I wonder if anybody has a picture of{F801}Ikebukuro... or something.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Ambitious Hunter\0{F87A,67}I really want to go!{F801}{F802}I might even risk getting eaten by{F801}demons, just for the chance to go{F801}there...{F801}{F802}I wonder if anybody has a picture of{F801}Ikebukuro... or something.{F801}

entry.source: Show him the camera{F801}Ignore him{F801}
entry.target: Show him the camera{F801}Ignore him{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Ambitious Hunter\0{F87A,67}{F813,1,403041}Hey, that's something fancy you've{F801}got there. Would it be possible for{F801}you to take pictures of Ikebukuro?{F801}{F802}There are only two places that I{F801}want to see.{F801}{F802}First is the most famous building{F801}in Ikebukuro, the sixty-story{F801}Sun Building!{F801}{F802}The other place is the Ikebukuro{F801}East Gate, where there is a row of{F801}huge department store buildings!{F801}{F802}I'd like you to take pictures of{F801}these two places and show them to{F801}me.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Ambitious Hunter\0{F87A,67}{F813,1,403041}Hey, that's something fancy you've{F801}got there. Would it be possible for{F801}you to take pictures of Ikebukuro?{F801}{F802}There are only two places that I{F801}want to see.{F801}{F802}First is the most famous building{F801}in Ikebukuro, the sixty-story{F801}Sun Building!{F801}{F802}The other place is the Ikebukuro{F801}East Gate, where there is a row of{F801}huge department store buildings!{F801}{F802}I'd like you to take pictures of{F801}these two places and show them to{F801}me.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Burroughs\0{F87A,2}{F813,1,502043}I will add this quest to the list.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Burroughs\0{F87A,2}{F813,1,502043}I will add this quest to the list.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Ambitious Hunter\0{F87A,67}{F813,1,403031}You look like you're a much better{F801}Hunter than I am. I'm sure you aren't{F801}afraid of going to Ikebukuro at all.{F801}{F802}I'm counting on you to bring those{F801}pictures.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Ambitious Hunter\0{F87A,67}{F813,1,403001}Oh... It's you!{F801}How was Ikebukuro?{F801}{F802}You've got the pictures, right?{F801}Let me see 'em.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Ambitious Hunter\0{F87A,67}{F813,1,403001}Oh... It's you!{F801}How was Ikebukuro?{F801}{F802}You've got the pictures, right?{F801}Let me see 'em.{F801}

entry.target: 〉 {F843,0} gave the man the{F801}pictures.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Ambitious Hunter\0{F87A,67}{F813,1,403021}This... this is... Ikebukuro...?{F801}{F802}Pools of blood, lakes of poison...{F801}Just pandemonium wherever you look.{F801}Is this the cost of freedom...?{F801}{F802}Damn, that was close. I was almost{F801}tricked by the promise of freedom.{F801}I was this close to running off...{F801}{F802}The Ashura-kai might get on my nerves{F801}once in a while, but I guess I belong{F801}in Shinjuku.{F801}{F802}Well, thanks for the pictures.{F801}You could say you just saved my life.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Ambitious Hunter\0{F87A,67}{F813,1,403021}This... this is... Ikebukuro...?{F801}{F802}Pools of blood, lakes of poison...{F801}Just pandemonium wherever you look.{F801}Is this the cost of freedom...?{F801}{F802}Damn, that was close. I was almost{F801}tricked by the promise of freedom.{F801}I was this close to running off...{F801}{F802}The Ashura-kai might get on my nerves{F801}once in a while, but I guess I belong{F801}in Shinjuku.{F801}{F802}Well, thanks for the pictures.{F801}You could say you just saved my life.{F801}
